info.title: OX REST API
info.description: Documentation of the Open-Xchange REST API.

tags.name: Admin
tags.description: Interface for provisioning and other administrative operations.

tags.name: InternetFreeBusy
tags.description: Servlet for requesting free busy data.

tags.name: Preliminary
tags.description: This module contains preliminary endpoints which can change in the future.

parameters.description: Limits the output to a specific number of entries.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Comma sperated list of fields to sort the output for. Field names that begin with "-" will be sorted descending else the fields get sorted ascending. Valid fields are 'date' and 'client_id'.
parameters.name: sort

200.description: An array of password change entries.

400.description: Bad request, response contains error message.

404.description: Not found. If path is wrong. Response contains error message.

500.description: Internal server error that might have multiple reasons, for instance no configured global database. Response contains error message.

put.summary: Used by the dovecot mail server to push messages to the server

user.description: The user identifier in the format <userId>@<contextId>. E.g. 3@1

from.description: The from header of the mail

200.description: A JSON object with a success field set to 'true'.

500.description: In case of internal server error that might have multiple reasons. Response contains error message.

parameters.name: context-group
parameters.description: The context group identifying the global DB where the feedback is stored.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The feedback type to send.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Start time in milliseconds since 1970-01-01 00:00:00 UTC. Only feedback given after this time is sent. If not set, all feedback up to -e is sent.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: End time in milliseconds since 1970-01-01 00:00:00 UTC. Only feedback given before this time is sent. If not set, all feedback since -s is sent.

200.description: A JSON array containing the stored user feedbacks.

400.description: Bad request, response contains error message.

404.description: Not found, if path is wrong (unknown context group or feedback type). Response contains error message.

500.description: Internal server error that might have multiple reasons, for instance no configured global database. Response contains error message.

parameters.name: context-group
parameters.description: The context group identifying the global DB where the feedback is stored.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The feedback type to send.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Start time in milliseconds since 1970-01-01 00:00:00 UTC. Only feedback given after this time is sent. If not set, all feedback up to -e is sent.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: End time in milliseconds since 1970-01-01 00:00:00 UTC. Only feedback given before this time is sent. If not set, all feedback since -s is sent.

parameters.name: delimiter
parameters.description: The column delimiter used. Default: ';'

200.description: Export data into a CSV file

400.description: Bad request, response contains error message.

404.description: Not found, if path is wrong (unknown context group or feedback type). Response contains error message.

500.description: Internal server error that might have multiple reasons, for instance no configured global database. Response contains error message.

x-ox-examples.description: Export user feedback from 2016-01-01 to 2016-12-31 as CSV

post.summary: Exports user feedback and sends exported data to provided recipients

parameters.name: context-group
parameters.description: The context group identifying the global DB where the feedback is stored.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The feedback type to send.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Start time in milliseconds since 1970-01-01 00:00:00 UTC. Only feedback given after this time is sent. If not set, all feedback up to -e is sent.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: End time in milliseconds since 1970-01-01 00:00:00 UTC. Only feedback given before this time is sent. If not set, all feedback since -s is sent.

400.description: Bad request, response contains error message.

404.description: Not found, if path is wrong (unknown context group or feedback type). Response contains error message.

500.description: Internal server error that might have multiple reasons, for instance no configured global database. Response contains error message.

x-ox-examples.description: Export user feedback from 2016-01-01 to 2016-12-31 and send it via mail to user1@example.org and user2@example.org
x-ox-examples.example:
POST http://localhost:8009/userfeedback/v1/send/default/star-rating-v1?start=1451606400&end=1483228799 {"subject":"User Feedback",
 "body":"User Feedback",
 "compress":true,
 "recipients": [
   {"address":"user1@example.org",
    "displayName":"User 1",
    "pgp_key":"-----BEGIN PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----\r\nVersion: BCPG v1.56...."},
   {"address":"user2@example.org",
    "displayName":"User 2",
    "pgp_key":"-----BEGIN PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----\r\nVersion: BCPG v1.56...."}
 ]
}

requestBody.description: JSONObject with fields "subject" for custom mail subject, "body" for custom mail body, boolean "compress" to compress the mail attachment and "recipients" (an JSON Array containing address, display name and PGP key (if available) for every recipient).

get.summary: Gets the free busy data in iCalendar format.

parameters.name: contextId
parameters.description: The context id of the context in which the requested user is located.

parameters.name: userName
parameters.description: The name of the user. Typically the local part of the email address.

parameters.name: server
parameters.description: The name of the server. Typically the domain part of the email address.

parameters.name: weeksIntoPast
parameters.description: The requested time range into the past in weeks. If this value is greater than the configured maximum, the free busy times are only requested to configured maximum. Default value is 1 week into the past.

parameters.name: weeksIntoFuture
parameters.description: The requested time range into the future in weeks. If this value is greater than the configured maximum, the free busy times are only requested to configured maximum. Default value is 4 week into the past.

parameters.name: simple
parameters.description: true, if the VFREEBUSY data should not contain free busy type and free information, false otherwise. Default value is false.

200.description: An iCalendar text containing the requested free busy data.

400.description: In case one parameter is invalid.

404.description: In case the servlet is not enabled, if no existing user with the requested user name, server and context id is found or if this user has not published his free busy data.

500.description: In case an internal server error occurs.

post.summary: Close a session by its ID

400.description: Bad request, response contains error message.

404.description: Not found. If path is wrong. Response contains error message.

500.description: Internal server error that might have multiple reasons, for instance no configured global database. Response contains error message.

requestBody.description: A JSON object containing an array of session ids.

parameters.name: session
parameters.description: The session id

200.description: A JSON object containing informations about the session.

schema.description: A json object containing informations about the session.

guest.description: Whether the session belongs to a guest user or not.

500.description: In case of internal server error that might have multiple reasons. Response contains error message.

client_id.description: Identifier of the client that was used to change the password. For example 'open-xchange-appsuite', 'provisioning-api'.

client_address.description: IP address of the client that was used to change the password. Only contained if it could be determined during the change.

client_name.description: Human-readable name of the client that was used to change the password. Only contained if the client ID has a known human-readable representation. If not set the client should fall-back to 'client_id'.

data.description: JSON object containing health-check's additional data

version.description: The middleware version running on this node

buildDate.description: The build date of the middleware running on this node

date.description: The date the health-check was executed

closed.description: Array of the closed session identifiers

providerName.description: The name of the device's provider

enabled.description: true, if the device is enabled, false if disabled

backup.description: true, if the device is a backup device, false otherwise

attributes.description: An json object containing the attributes of the capability

contextAdminAuth.description: The API can be accessed via HTTP Basic Auth with context administrator credentials or reseller/master administrator credentials if MASTER_ACCOUNT_OVERRIDE is enabled.

masterAdminAuth.description: The API can be accessed via HTTP Basic Auth with reseller/master administrator credentials.
